text: Uha tuhade la'i khuda tuhade hi vi'akatitava vicom ika misala bi'ana karada hai. Ki' tuhade gulamam vicom ko'i tuhadi usa puji da bha'ivala hai, jo asim tuhanu bakhasi hai ki tusim ate uha usa vica barabara hove. Ate jisa tar'ham tusim apani'am da khi'ala rakhade ho use tar'ham unham (gulamam) da vi dhi'ana rakhade ho. Isa tar'ham asim a'itam nu sapasata karake bi'ana karade ham unham lokam la'i jihare budhi tom kama lainde hana
